channel.title: General Juggling Fun Weekend Tired Intonation Tommie Sunshine on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Juggling Fun Weekend Tired Intonation Tommie Sunshine on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: holy damn tired. Juggling for Pride. intonation
item.description: Woah. I am so damned tired. I slept a LOT today. Like nap after nap after nap. and no actual rest. So this weekend was nuts. First off it was intonation festival weekend. I usually HATE festivals but intonation is often fun and full of good bands. I wasn’t going to go - but tommie is in town and had passes - so i was able to stop by. I saw the boredoms, ghostface killer, the streets and lady soverign.
